Text:
Next - Silent Hill [2006]

Rules for requesting:

1)Only request if you can be patient
2)All new requests will go to the end of my list[except "just Uploads"]
3)Search ahashare,Piratebay and 300mbunited before requesting
4)Request only if blu-ray or hd source is available
5)Don't request dvdrip's as i will not do them
6)Only request again after i fulfilled your previous requests
7)Only request if you are happy with the above rules

@jarman

I know that i accepted your request for lord of the rings trilogy but i didn't know that riddlerA uploaded them already so try these 

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5469507/The_Lord_of_the_Rings_I_%282001%29Extd_Edition_720p_x264_by_RiddlerA

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5471029/The_Lord_of_the_Rings_II_%282002%29Extd_Ed_720p_x264_by_RiddlerA

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5472865/The_Lord_of_the_Rings_III_%282003%29_Extd_Ed_720p_x264_by_RiddlerA

Riddler is the top uploader on tpb so the quality will be great, so i will appreciate it if you can cancel your request and download these instead because it doesn't make sense for me to encode almost replicas of the ones riddler uploaded but if you still want me to do them i will keep them on my list 

@All
this is why i ask you to search before requesting

@kant200r

Added Children of Men (2006) to my list and Man on Fire (2004) is available on united300.blogsp0t.com
@gunnersrock.. i found 300mb united very useful..but it doesnt have resume support.. am i right..is there something we can do about it..

@smasudi
yes you can't resume but you can download a freeware called "free rapid downloader" and add various links from host sites to it and it will download files in the background without you having to download each file manually
